section_1.title: Automatic dictionary generation
section_1.info: This website is the result of our first attempt at generating a dictionary. This is a prototype. We have combined some of the most common NLP techniques to create a dictionary

section_2.title: Different seach modes
section_2.info: The way we access information in a dictionary is very important. We want to go beyond the standard search bar and allow the user to have more control over waht they want to find. For this reason, we have implemented different ways to search for a lemma in our dictionary.
